DOC.brief_summary: Oxford Pharmascience ( sponsor ) develop new formulation Ibuprofen ( OXP001 - study drug ) propose less side effect currently report standard prescription strength Ibuprofen . This study compare study drug already market formulation prescription strength Ibuprofen ( reference product ) look drug take body also perform specialist procedure call endoscopy ( specifically gastroscopy ) . The safety tolerability study drug also assess . The study involve approximately 44 healthy male female subject . Subjects randomly assign receive either study drug reference product 8 day . On Day 1 , subject receive single 800 mg dose ibuprofen . On Days 2 9 , subject receive 800 mg ibuprofen three time day .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study OXP001 Brufen Healthy Subjects
